metadata.title: CVE-2017-9054 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue, also known as DW201703-002, was discovered in libdwarf2017-03-21. In _dwarf_decode_s_leb128_chk() a byte pointer was dereferencedjust before it was checked for being in bounds, leading to a heap-basedbuffer over-read.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
